    • Method Detail

      • lemmatize

        public java.lang.String lemmatize(java.lang.String token,
                                  java.lang.String tag)
        This method retrieves the lemma of a given token, when classified with a given PoS tag.
        Parameters:
        token - the token whose lemma is wanted
        tag - the PoS tag of the token
        Returns:
        the lemma of the token (when classified with the given tag)

      • lemmatize

        public java.lang.String lemmatize(java.lang.String token,
                                  java.lang.String tag,
                                  int flags)
        This method retrieves the lemma of a given token, when classified with a given PoS tag.
        Parameters:
        token - the token whose lemma is wanted
        tag - the PoS tag of the token
        flags - the reductions that should be applied
        Returns:
        the lemma of the token (when classified with the given tag)
